name: GALACTICA (AS studios)
description:
Wanna have some adventure in the galactic world?

If yes, Then play Galactica where you have to roam around the galactic world and be safe from the asteroids and collect coins to increase your score.

You can play it in any devices but preferably mobile devices.

Control: Joystick Only. :D

Please give your feedback and support us to make more games like this.
